Tile Actions: The Tile action library is where you can find the actions required to get or set tile indices within a room, as well as change how they are shown, among other things (for more information on tiles, please see the section on tile map here):
{IMG_TXT} Set Tile Index At Pixel Icon
{IMG_TXT} Get Tile Index At Pixel Icon
{IMG_TXT} Set Tile Index In Cell Icon
{IMG_TXT} Get Tile Index In Cell Icon
{IMG_TXT} Set Tile Data At Pixel Icon
{IMG_TXT} Get Tile Data At Pixel Icon
{IMG_TXT} Set Tile Data In Cell Icon
{IMG_TXT} Get Tile Data In Cell Icon
{SEARCH_RESULT} Section detailing all the Tile actions
